mapper.select: select count(*) from talent_board where talent_no=#{talentNo}

select talent_board_no as talentBoardNo, talent_board_title as talentBoardTitle, talent_board_content as talentBoardContent, talent_no as talentNo, talent_board_writer as talentBoardWriter from (select rownum as rnum, n.* from (select * from talent_board order by talent_board_no desc)n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end} and talent_no = #{talentNo}
